I can see you're making due with just your ego for company...
It really is quite the statement that bathing suit makes, Sheena. I imagine heads come rightly unscrewed as you walk by.
We might need to stop and make sure Shimakaze is still in good health. That last shock clearly disoriented her!
Oh, a pirate? I've spent a lot of time in Limsa Lominsa back in Eorzea, a thalassocracy founded and run by pirates. Are you from some similar place, Nami?

'Tis most unfortunate that one could be written off without the benefit of being judged on their own merits. Let us endeavor to do better and become better acquainted before deciding to dislike one another.

You seem to be under the impression I intend to use force of arms to subdue you. I was cautioned against bringing weapons here, so unlike you I am unarmed. Rest assured that violence is not what I had in mind.

I'm sure the prospect of a fight breaking out between us delights you, but alas I left my arms at home since I was cautioned to do so. Nay, I've been aware all along 'twould not avail me to come to blows with you.
How very glib, but I don't suppose you think me naive enough to believe that once this game ends we shall no longer have reason to quarrel?
You must think me quite naive, but really, why wouldn't you? We may be opponents in this game, but we are adversaries on a much more fundamental level as well.
See, where I come from 'tis the Empire that has to worry about pirate attacks. Piracy is all but illegal in Eorzea, save for performing raids upon the imperial vessels invading her boarders.

If 'twould be only a few years, I suppose that would be similar to stocking provisions for a journey on the sea. Though, to put oneself into stasis and then cast out into unknown territory seems almost impossibly brazen...

So then nowadays for you it 'twould be no different that stocking up a ship to cross the ocean. For your ancestors to lock themselves in such a stasis to brave an unknown frontier they were either confident or desperate...
By the- oh dear! ...Well, that raises more than a few questions...
This is ~player~'s doing? Are we quite sure about that? If you're here to destroy, I would speculate that two of you may have competing agendas...
Oh, ~player~? If it's ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ then would this not be some sort of come on to you? How unexpected...
Compact, yet contains the power to bend the elements? That nearly beggars belief. I'd be curious to meet whoever engineered it. They must have quite the keen intellect.

No bigger than a stave, yet the device itself is able to harness all that power. 'Tis quite the feat of engineering, I daresay. I'd be most curious to meet the architect of such a device. The wisdom they must possess...
You appear unharmed, but if you've any hurts or burns do let me know and I can heal you. Passing strange, that fire...
Well, you are as of yet unharmed. 'Tis still concerning...
Oh dear, are you still well, Shimakaze? You look shaken after that one.
Oh, a Miqo'te? But you have no tail, so mayhap you are something different. Regardless, 'twould seem we have more in common than I first thought.
~Clothing~ aside, I believe this is still very much your game to lose, ~target~.
To each their own. We shall see if this pays off in the end.
At least you keep things interesting, ~target~.
Well, so long as you are losing instead of me I'll make no complaint.
I suppose how you choose to strip is neither here nor there. I've only to claim victory in the end.
Mayhap I should simply be glad I was victorious rather than turn up my nose at the results.
Though, I am in no place to pass judgment...
You are doing better than me, honestly...
Hardly seems fair. I was so careful, and yet ~target~ is still in the game and not me.
I suppose you don't quite feel the same hunger I do...
You could do to lose an inhibition or two.
Mayhap you should find your desire to simply rip your clothes off buried deep inside. If such a desire was buried in me, 'tis like you've got some inkling of it locked away someplace.
No point in complaining. Let us just be about it.
Terribly curious to see what you will do next. I pray you have no intentions to disappoint.
I do have something of a time table here, ~target~. When the effect wears off, there is likely a huge headache awaiting me.
We should all hope for greater things in this next round.
What's done is done. The game continues.
What else is there to say? Clearly the game's not over yet.
Keep your mind on the cards, ~target~. You risk another loss if you don't weigh your options carefully.
Seems you're determined to keep going, ~target~.
Perhaps you'll make a comeback this round, ~target~.
Seems we've another round waiting for us.
Focus, Shtola. Focus.
I won't get hung up on it. I'll just focus on winning.
I can still fight. I could still win this.
I should likely focus on saving my own skin.
'Tis a shame that beating you and preserving my dignity are linked so inextricably.
I must needs be careful if I am to pull through the next round as well.
I do wish you better luck this round, ~target~.
If you've a mind to do it, you could walk away victorious, ~target~.
I wish I had more advice for you, ~name~.
No matter how this game plays out, no doubt this shall go down as the most shameful display...
Stalling, ~target~? You look ready to forfeit from where I'm standing.
Yes, well, I did not think you would be capable of becoming more indecent than you already are.
Ha, seeing as ~target~ is already exposed I'd not expected much more than this. Oh well, what can one do?
Aye, a wise move were you not already so exposed...
Your ~clothing~? Should I take this as proof of your voyeuristic tendencies?
You forestall your ultimate defeat, ~target~. You are already exposed, why not just forfeit and relieve yourself?
I shall have to simply try to get some enjoyment out of this then.
Oh, you shall spoil my appetite before you even begin to sate it, 'twould seem.
It will take more than a half-measure to impress me, ~target~, especially at this late stage.
'Tis quite clear you're not trying to impress me, ~target~. That is quite a shame.
Is it too late to try and talk you into a more substantial decision?
Oh, must you vex me so?
That certainly seems apropos.
Nothing smaller to tribute, ~target~? You're not worried, are you?
Are you sure, ~target~? Your ~clothing~? If you've no smaller moves to make...
Well, that's certainly not nothing.
If that's is your choice, then so be it. Strikes me as quite a fair move.
Aye, that's the way to do it if you must sacrifice something.
Oh? Perhaps we will get to see something a mite interesting.
This is good. This is progress.
I've seen a man remove his ~clothing~ before, but it's never been quite so nerve-wracking.
At least I'm past your ~clothing~ now. It's something.
Aye, still not all that much. It will do, no doubt about that.
A fitting tribute, even if I had hoped for a bit more.
Aye, it's a good choice, even if I'd prefer you play more recklessly.
Sorry, ~target~, but that's more tease than strip.
I wouldn't say this exactly leaves me wanting more as much as it is just a disappointment.
It's upsetting to know I lost so thoroughly...
Though, 'tis a bit hard to stand in judgment given my predicament.
You're an odd one for sure, ~target~, but you're right at home here, aren't you?
The eye is still drawn to the same place as before.
I believe this was inevitable. How could a man who cannot keep his trousers up hope to hold onto his ~clothing~?
If it is of any consolation, your ~clothing~ did very little to distract from your manhood.
I doubt this round will stick out in anybody's mind moving forward.
You've yet another chance coming to you to prove you can provide some excitement.
Naught to do but keep bashing away at you until you give us what we want.
Very well, you shall be made to lose again. If fortune is ever fair 'tis only fitting.
Well, I am confident I can simply beat you again, ~target~. Should be fun!
Hmm, well, I suppose this slow show does serve to entice me. I should caution you against making me any more hungry than I already am.
Do me a favor and lose again. I seem to have grown increasingly bored with you...
Come now, ~target~. If I ask very politely, will you show me a little more?
If that's all settled, the game can proceed.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ merely a thing of the past now.
Watch out, ~target~, you're not out of the woods yet.
Care to stay and perhaps lose more, ~target~? Or mayhap your luck will turn right around.
I hope your luck improves, ~target~. Of course, so long as it does not turn upon me.
If you're sticking around, ~target~, I guess that means we will be seeing more of you.
The mystery of ~target~ is unraveling before us, quite literally almost.
Steel yourself for the next round.
You think this isn't ended for you, but it's the same for me.
I must secure victory again. The price of defeat is far too steep.
I've a feeling I can triumph over ~target~ in this next round as well.
I don't like losing all that much, but the idea of winning is terribly enticing.
It just goes to show you can still be beat. Of course, it's the same for me, obviously.
If you're continuing, ~target~, keep in mind that while luck can be fickle it can also be terrifyingly consistent.
Yes, yes, the game shall continue without your ~clothing~ much like it continues despite me.
No remedy for it, save for ~target~ to lose once more.
I suppose if the tables were turned, I wouldn't feel much remorse.
Florina! 'Tis only an insect, no harm will come to you!
'Tis a harmless insect, Florina. You're not in any danger!
Hm? S-Shantae? Your body... what happened?
I know my sight is not what it used to be, but I could not have possibly just seen Shantae turn into... a monkey?
Sakura, you're--- Oh dear...

Ah, that's a sentiment I can relate to. I was never really close to any of my sisters since I hardly ever saw them. I'm much closer to my fellow Scions, scholars I met during my studies at the Studium.

I had an inkling there may be shared ancestry to explain that fact. I suppose if you've achieved the mean feat of taming a star's atmosphere to suit you, then Mejare might very well closely resemble here as well.
A shared ancestry seemed so mundane an explanation, I had nearly thought to dismiss it. So, terraforming? I suppose that means your Mejare and this place also bear similar aspects.
Spoil the surprise? That... 'tis a worrisome sentiment. Best I can discern, your aether bears a unique marker. To say much beyond that, 'twould be merely conjecture.
I am... sorry? It's just, I've not seen such a strange aether within a person before. I won't pry if you insist upon... surprising us.
W-What in the world?
Ah, so I had the right of it. Forgive me, but I had my suspicions.
I had wondered if you planned to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off at all.
See, if it were me I'd have taken that off before I bared myself.
At this point, I do believe you can strip off what you please with impunity.
The difference between our sensibilities could not be clearer.
I'm assuming ~target~ has their priorities straight, but I cannot see where waiting to make this move was well advised.
Your decisions continue to vex me...
Alright, fine. The decision is ultimately yours to make. I did not come here like this to be bored, though.
If I were not in such a rare mood, I'd likely make the same move in your position.
With your ~clothing~ gone, my odds are at least slightly better.
Is this all you have to offer up? Looking at you, I'd say not.
Not a terribly exciting choice. 'Tis not like your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a big deal. Still, I'd be as prudent on any other day, I suppose..
Just your ~clothing~? 'Tis a necessary step, I suppose.
I suppose your ~clothing~ will do. I should not broker complaint.
A most unfortunate blow to your defenses, ~target~.
The stakes are only going to get higher, ~target~.
Your ~clothing~, while flattering, must now be sacrificed.
Oh, giving us a glimpse of something nice?
It's a pity. ~clothing.ifPlural(They are|It is a)~ nice ~clothing~.
That will do fine if it is your choice, ~target~.
Any advantage you lose over me is a welcome change.
If I was in your place, I'd likely make the same move.
With your ~clothing~ gone, my odds are at least slightly better.
Given my situation, it's hard to think about this from a perspective of other than how this bodes for my own chances to win.
Considering where I am, ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ no big deal. Although, were our roles reversed I would likely make the exact same move.
Just your ~clothing~? It's alright, but even though I did not lose it does make me feel as if I am going to lose...
I'd been hoping for a windfall this round, but I suppose I'll have to work a bit more for that.
Is that really the safest move you can make right now?
I see you're in no rush to lose.
Be forewarned, ~target~. Your luck may go with your ~clothing~.
Well, knowledgeable and confident? I imagine you're popular wherever you hail from.
Oh my! Speaking of closeness, I see you've brought a friend along!
An unfortunate setback, to be sure. 'Tis not like we aren't marred with our own craters as it is. Even five years out, nobody has tried to rebuild in the crater at Carteneau.
That's a troubling predicament, though, I can think of at least one crater in Eorzea that's been naught but a waste of the past five years.
Well, color me intrigued. I wonder what arcane secrets you are harboring.
If you dare to promise so much, I shall have to get my hopes up in anticipation.
That's... astute?
A familiar? Is that what that is? It seemed reluctant to approach the group, so I had figured 'twas not a threat.
Her socks exploded. Her socks exploded? Why did her socks explode and are you okay, Shimakaze?
I know not every revenant is a mindless puppet, Sakura, nor that anyone asks to be reanimated. I'm quite certain your circumstances are not of my business.
Dismemberments are always unpleasant to see, beheadings most of all. I know not what its worth, Sakura, but you're handling better than anyone else.
If exposing yourself early was some sort of mind game to win, I'm not so sure it has worked as you would have liked.
Well, I'll not say there's no difference from before, but I'm sure it will go unnoticed for now.
So long as you're having fun, right ~target~?
Ah, apologies. I don't mean to laugh. It's just so strange I could not help it, even in my state.
Oh dear, there is a part of me that wishes I were as brave as you, but I shall choose to ignore that...
Mayhap I should not question your choices. 'Tis not like I am in any position to preach about decency.
Still, I find it lacking...
I suppose my busting free of my restraints was not inspiring to you.
Hm, so hungry...
Well, I suppose the pursuit does make the reward all the sweeter.
I'm afraid there's a good chance you'll be losing the rest of it anyway.
Pray fortune finds you again, ~target~. I'll not let it, if I can help it.
Now then, let's see what else can be lost.
If we're all satisfied, then we may proceed.
I imagine there will be more to see in the coming rounds.
Careful, ~target~. If you're not careful this game will extract a much higher toll from you.
And just like that we're on to the next round.
If you're resolved to stay, then mind your choices in the coming rounds, ~target~.
If you're staying, you must think you can best me. Sounds like an exciting challenge.
There will be plenty of time to admire in the next round.
I will not be found lacking, not again.
I can only endeavor to maintain my place.
Apologies, ~target~, but I must continue playing in earnest.
I mustn't go easy on you, ~target~, so long as you're playing.
Sticking around, ~target~? Just know that I'm not going easy on anybody.
Don't think I'll let your luck turn around, ~target~. I'm still playing to win.
The outcome of the next round need not be unfortunate for you, ~target~. Just think carefully.
Through it all, luck remains your greatest ally. Pray only that you remain her only ally.
If you're afraid of losing, then now's the time to muster your courage.
How fascinating! I've scarce seen anything like this back on the Source or out in the First.
Mm, yes, I could stand to see a little more of this.
Good to see you're not afraid to expose a bit of flesh, ~target~.
Oh, it's a start. Let's get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ off you, shall we?
Don't go and lose your spine and your ~clothing~, ~target~.
Feeling more than a bit peckish, ~target~. Pray tell you've got something of substance for me.
Oh, enticing. Very well, pay me your attentions then.
So, you would give us something other than your aplomb to admire?
Don't think you have to show off just because there's a woman watching, ~target~.
Short on options or large on mettle? We need only look at ~target~ to know.
This is what those who play this game are seeking to encounter, right?
Doing us a favor, ~target~?
Oh? Quite the treat for us.
Ah-ha, you spoil us, ~target~.
Quite a bit of excitement surrounding this move. Can't you tell?
Mayhap it's unfair to foist upon you that which I would prefer to avoid...
I mustn't over think things here. This is another ilm towards victory.
Though it seems a major blow, I mustn't relax quite yet.
Quite the loss, ~target~. I'm more confident now that I could defeat you.
Seems events may work out in my favor after all.
Well, 'tis somewhat enticing, if I'm being honest. Still, I must focus on winning.
Can you afford to lose that?
You needn't be embarrassed, ~target~. Believe me.
Would you feel more comfortable if I looked away?

I see. This small creature was responsible for your previous aetheric properties, that much is clear now. By combining your essence, one becomes enhanced while the other becomes stabilized. Fascinating...
Can't say I've ever seen the Garlean war machina do that before.
Mm, please tell me you'll be staying to play a little longer.
Mayhap you could stir my passions and sate my hunger, but we'll need to exact a bit more than this.
No, still too tame for me to~background.time~. I implore you to try a bit more.
I sense you've yet more to show us. I pray you do not disappoint as it would not suite my mood to~background.time~.
I'm expecting more still, unless you're too afraid to proffer it.
Hm, interesting, but still insufficient. I could do with more.
Please keep up the momentum, or I will simply defeat you here and not spare you another thought.
I know it might be embarrassing, but I'm certain nobody thinks less of you, ~target~.
Continuing, ~target~? Are you sure that's wise?
What I most admire is your resolve to continue, ~target~.
Don't feel compelled to stay on our account, ~target~. No guarantee your luck won't sour further.
Brave of you to stick around, ~target~. Let's see what more we can have you lose.
Glad you'll stick around, ~target~. I'm sure you've more to show us.
I won't quit either. I'll see this through until the end.
If you want to back out now ~target~, I'd gladly join you.
We stand to lose so much, and yet we choose to press on...
I don't even need to guess at what is compelling you to stay.
I'll admit I've remained to play due to my being a bit of a sore loser, but I wonder what's keeping ~target~ in this game.
I get the feeling both ~target~ and I are going to need a stiff drink after all is said and done.
Maybe your luck will turn around, ~target~. Seeing your loss though has me confident I could defeat you with a bit of effort.
Don't think of yourself as undressed but rather... liberated.
Don't worry too much about losing, ~target~. Your objective is to win, so focus on that.
It won't get any easier from here on out, so stay positive, ~target~.
Oh, is this a jacket designed to increase your buoyancy? Seems far more practical than how Urianger tried to overcome his own inability to swim.
A single string? Seems like you're really treading a line here.
Virgo, is it? She seems different than the egis I have seen, nearly as if she were a complete person.
Turning into a viera? That's quite the feat unto itself.

While I've never been on a trip to space myself, Eorzea has had a few visitors from beyond our own star. 'Tis amusing you would say "the dragon" seeing as it really was a single dragon and his eggs who ventured across the stars to our planet.

Me? Aye, nary have I had the chance of traveling through space, but Eorzea does play host to the dragons. All of them are descendents of the first dragon and his clutch of eggs that came here so very long ago from his far-flung star.
It's your choice, Emi. Your resolve to win is beyond admirable.
Ha, well, if you're comfortable with it, Emi, I don't see how we could object.
Twelve preserve!
Oh no, Shimakaze!
Shimakaze is quite sturdy for a girl her size...
Unfortunately, Saki, 'twould seem you've been backed into a bit of a corner. Will it be the top or the bottom this time?
My, my. Quite the creative setups you have, Akko.
Do the other mages of your circle specialize in this sort of thing or is this your specialty in particular, Akko?
Shall we stand in solidarity with our exposure, ~target~? I expect you'll wear it well.
We're not taking any prisoners to~background.time~.
No need to be frightened. 'Tis not the kind of scare this season is for, I daresay.
You've got nothing to hide from me, ~target~. There is the faintest scent of your desire to proceed coming from you.
Don't fret over your poor luck and poor judgment. Seems we're all to play victim to them tonight.
Would you be so audacious as to steal away that attention I seem to be so hungry for tonight, ~target~? Ah, so be it.
Still feeling strong, ~target~?
Seems like you're almost to the good part, ~target~.
How are you feeling, ~target~? Stomach in knots?
I do not envy your position, ~target~. You get full marks for bravery.
My, this game is nerve-wracking. I apologize for this, ~target~.
Ah, I shouldn't laugh. I fare no better when put in your position...
Oh, a bold choice, ~target~.
I'm sure nobody here would mind seeing a bit more of your body, ~target~.
A little more of ~target~ will be coming to light.
Very well, let's have it then!
The idea of solidarity carries a slight comfort with it.
A pity this game takes no prisoners.
If you don't freak out, I may freak out for you...
So, we shall both be overexposed, ~target~. Mayhap we should hide behind one another?
Seems we're both having a run of poor luck, or perhaps even poor judgment.
Hopefully this will more evenly distribute the stares being passed round.
Remain strong, ~target~.
This is not an easy part of the game for any of us, ~target~.
My stomach was already in knots by the time I got down to your level, ~target~.
On the other hand, 'twould seem that string was really doing much of the work keeping your bosom in check.
My, my, that's quite the mature bathing suit. Mayhap you were hoping to impress someone? I'd say you're bound for success.
I do understand where you're coming from. Mayhap you feel uncomfortable, but you look quite nice.
Oh, egi most definitely do not do that to their summoners.
Oh, it's been a ruse all along? 'Tis nice to know, but it's not like I wasn't playing best I could from the first.
Your ruse seems to have paid off, even if just a bit. It does not seem wise to reveal this now that you're at this critical stage.
I had been thinking you were more experienced than you were letting on. Seems your plot got the better of me.
I see, well, you've nothing to fear from me. I've not the slightest who I would even tell.
Your identity is your business. I would dream of letting it slip, even if I knew who to tell.
Still, unless your luck turns around quickly this will be an ultimately fruitless effort.
If fortune does indeed favor the bold, Emi might secure victory; however, luck remains an ever fickle companion.
Seems you've been through something unpleasant...
I've seen my fair share of scars and wounds during my life. I understand the unpleasantness of it all...
Are you daft? Such weapons are not toys!
By the Twelve, can you really be okay after taking such a direct hit?
Oh dear... you do appear unharmed this time. Please say something if you are hurt...
Shimakaze, you don't have to keep playing if the game is going to be so dangerous for you!
'Twould seem your undergarments leave little to the imagination.
... Or you could do that?
Looks like we've not quite had our fill of you yet.
This is a bit more like the excitement I'd been craving.
Certainly we are moving in the right direction now.
I've never had fewer reservations about losing, but 'twould be so much fun to win still.
I'd say the excitement and the terror are both quite palpable. Appropriate given the season, is it not?
Hm, maybe I should try harder to win this whole thing. It does sound quite satisfying...
Your determination is admirable, ~target~, but struggle serves to whet the appetite.
Seems you'll have no quarter before all is said and done.
Maybe my position is looking a bit more enviable now, hm? 'Tis far less stressful.
So, can you keep it together for yet another go around?
If I'm not being too forward, seems like you have something worth flaunting.
Keep playing and perhaps you'll get your revenge.
Well, the ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ off and as I suspected you're no worse off for it.
Whether fortunately or unfortunately for you, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ off and the world has not ended.
Seems you've been taking care of yourself. No shame in that.
The women here always have such nice bodies. 'Tis almost flattery that I am here among them.
I hope no one will have issue concentrating on the game with ~target~ in such a state.
This is good for me, but our business has not yet concluded.
This has all been more exciting than I can handle...
This is an ilm, nay, a fulm in the right direction.
Seeing you lose such an important piece makes me feel as though I just might pull this whole thing off.
The excitement is palpable, yes, but so is the terror.
I'm still determined to win. To come this far and lose would simply be a shame.
Can't deny your determination, ~target~. Despite being set against one another, we are in this together.
This game is ruthless all the way until the end...
Passing strange that your position now seems enviable to me.
Your most pressing concern should be your next round.
Is that the ordinance from earlier?
S-super w-wigging what?!
W-what? Gods!
Ah, the ordinance from before is--!
That is some foreboding aether...
'Tis no jest. You need only see this from my perspective...
Hm, yes please.
I could eat. Hm, is that strange to say here?
'Tis more than just a taste this time. Delightful...
Don't men walk around with their shirts off regularly? I'd hardly call this risque.
Oh, your bare chest? Forgive me if my feigned excitement is unconvincing.
My, my, quite the roguish move.
A man with a bare chest in public? More tasteful than daring, I must say.
Seems to me men doff their shirts with nary an excuse under normal circumstances.
Do not complain of your losses to me, ~target~. For men, a bare chest is no different from having visible ankles.
I do not wish to hear any complaints about this, ~target~. Most men I know avoid wearing shirts.
Doffing your ~clothing~ then? Amazing how men will expose their chests and then strut about like it's some big deal.
Let us not pretend any man showing his chest is equal to a woman showing hers.
Hold on, ~target~, your ~clothing~? Oh, I-I suppose that's not a big deal.
Having your ~clothing~ off shouldn't bother me, but in this context...
Oh, this is wrong... so very, very wrong...
Well, perhaps this is more suitable? No one would expect a raving lunatic to be completely clothed.
What you need, nay, what you lack is some essential dignity. That much is clear.
What you need is a cure or two or three for whatever ails that mind of yours.
To rend the asylum of your own clothes, especially in this game, indicates to me your problem requires something beyond healing.
Something hit me in the face. I pray it was a piece of your jacket and not one of your hairs.
I've not the time to explain to you the myriad of things that were wrong with that.
Bobobo you are either brilliant beyond comprehension or an unparalleled dullard. As a rational person, I'm inclined to think it's the latter.

I've no idea what a "Shadow Game" is, but if you're still set on leaving then I would encourage you to simply go. Whatever force destroyed your shirt likely just wanted to make sure you made good on the bet.
You must be awfully proud of yourself.
I'm not particularly impressed, but I'm very nearly always around some very fit people.
Yes, your muscles are nice, but they are obscured by how terrible you are at cards.
Do your muscles serve some purpose? I mean beyond attempting to impress us.
These sorts of things are nice too.
Extra weight has oft been a sign of prosperity, but too often do we sacrifice health for prosperity.
How does the saying go? "There is more to love?"
Women have told me heavier men are better for a tender embrace, but I have not had such an occasion.
A bit on the lean side, aren't we? I hear eating eggs can help a fellow fill out.
I suppose food is no vice of yours, ~target~.
I mean no offense, but I have half a mind to buy you a meal, ~target~. Do you like eel pie?
You're built like a friend of mine, Urianger. Ladies like him well enough, if that matters to you.
Well, 'tis a site that certainly takes one mind off of things.
Gods, here I am blushing at the sight of a man's bare chest as if I were some sheltered, high-born lady...
I'm in no mood to gawk or jeer at such things... but it shan't hurt to have a look.
Aye, 'twould seem I'm not above doing a little leering of my own. 'Tis only fair.
It's not that I dislike seeing such things, but over the years I've had my fill.
When I have decided to swoon, I'll send a missive.
See? You've nothing you must needs hide from me.
Perhaps a bit unremarkable, but that is not all together a bad thing.
Well... what could be wrong with that?
Hmm, maybe a bit of a chill...
Actually, I don't miss the ~clothing~.
In the grand scheme of things, 'twould be best if I made my own way. My goal is not to be a tourist, but to open the way betwixt mine own world and the rest.
So, what can we expect this time? Yet more underwear? Another visit from one of your esteemed companions?
I can feel my curiosity getting the better of me already.
Finally. The anticipation was making me absolutely famished.
Do try and not to look completely embarrassed, ~target~. 'Twould spoil the satisfaction.
Well, I shan't say to~background.time~ was a waste. Come now, ~target~, I've been waiting...
Well? We're all waiting.
Little boys and their little toys...
Oh, don't be cruel, Shtola. You'd be inconsolable in his shoes.
I know you're likely worried, ~target~, but you surely needn't. The rest of us have that covered.
I cannot promise I will not laugh, and I doubly apologize in advance should that come to pass.
This just means you're that much closer to losing.
I should have anticipated something like this, but I suppose I did not want to...
Is it too much to hope the sight of your penis will not further embarrass me?
Winning has its costs too, I suppose.
Shtola, why do you not look away?
~Target~'s knob is going to pop out of his ~clothing~ and then I just know we'll make eye contact and after that I am quite unsure!
H-hold on! I have... several misgivings!
I... know not what I should look at...
Oh, aren't you cute?
Hm, a girl ought to be careful with a man who's got much to prove.
Well, isn't this a fascinating development?
Is this where the intrigue ends. Don't think me disappointed, just pondering if there were signs.
... Perhaps we'd best move on.
I... well... I lack the sentiment to ameliorate this situation.
Well, now we've all seen it. Further comment would be cruel.
I hope I do not overstep when I say that this is ultimately not the measure of a lover.
Ah, yes, I am reminded we all have things we'd rather keep hidden.
Oh... well... erm...
You may not want my pity, but regretfully you have it.
No, no words can remedy this. I choose silence.
Ooooh... oh no...
I-I am not looking! I did not look! I've nothing to say!
Hoooh, Shtola is having a bad day...
Don't say anything, Shtola, just avert your gaze...
Wait, you'd lose on purpose? Just to do... erm, that? With all of us here?
Your attachment to your hat, while touching, may ultimately lead to your downfall; however, 'tis your choice to make.
Aye, well, 'tis your funeral after all. You're free to fail on your own terms if it means so much to you.
Seems a waste. If you hand it here, I would gladly don it for an extra layer.
I daresay I don't see the benefit to retaining your hat, but I'll not be the first to compel you to lose any slower.
You mean, you want to lose? Even with all of us here?
It does stir the imagination...
Hm, rather than seeing my curiosity sated I find myself even more curious now. Terrible thing, that.
Oh, the man does not disappoint...
Good, but there's still more to show, ~target~. Much more.
So, this is the most honest part of you?
Well, he is handsome as far as knobs go.
To my fellow players, I present you this: a man.
~Target~'s thoughts may be unknown to us, but this may serve to enlighten us.
I know you may be unable to help it, but if I see that move I may flee this place.
How will I focus on playing with that thing staring at me?
You must understand: I had hoped to be wearing more clothes before I encountered your exposed manhood.
I mean no disrespect, ~target~, but from now on let's refrain from eye contact.
Hah, oh! J-just ignore me.
Makes a girl wonder...
I suppose... looking is harmless...
Ah, oh, was that a chill I felt?
Oh? Undercutting the tension with a come-on instead of a punchline? A rather bold change in tactics for a man with all of that exposed.
Well pivoted, Bobobo, but I had enough trouble taking your come-ons seriously when you were fully dressed.
Gah! T-that was the only thing I wasn't expecting!
Oh! Or just your penis? I nearly forgot that could happen.
Well, I did seek to sate a rather large appetite.
Hm, my rare mood does require a rare satisfaction.
I just grow curiouser and curiouser...
Maybe it's the experimental magicks talking, but I could go for a lover like that.
That is absolutely ridiculous!
Come now, is this some sort of jest?
Ah ha-ha! Oh, n-no! I'm sorry, but just-just look at that thing! It seems impossible!
Ho-ho, no! Those poor girls!
Is... is this some sort of put-on?
Oh, no... I mustn't look! It would be far too rude to laugh.
You cannot be serious. You simply... cannot be serious.
Oh? Is this the source of your confidence? Gods, men...
Ah-ha-ha! N-n-no! Put it away! I-I cannot continue w-while I am laughing!
... That's not real, right? I mean, it's simply not feasible...
Ah-ha-ha! Oh-ha-ha-ha! P-please tell me-he you're joking! Ah-ha-ha!
Well, just looking at that is painful.
By the Twelve, such heat!
Oh, I've certainly seen the type back in Eorzea. There are adventurers brazen enough to go topless, and with nary a beach in site.
This surge in water aether? A summons?
Aye, ~player~ does seem to be a fixture around here. We've had more than our fair share of encounters here. Though, I do suppose that means I've also been a frequent player myself...
Florina, I'm sure it's more scared of you than you are of... actually, that seems unlikely...
Florina, just breathe and be still. It will likely leave you alone if you do!
Oh my, ahem... oh dear? Polly no? Come back? Ah, I do not want to give away the ruse...
Ay, at least there are no arrows being slung at us. Even so, it takes no small measure of courage to expose oneself like this. I have to wonder where this courage is stemming from.
Is that so? Well, I hadn't pinned ~player~ for such a lech. Mayhap ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ should find a more respectable hobby.
'Tis all rather exciting, if not a tad harrowing. Well, maybe a lot harrowing, but that just might be me. Others here seem unbothered by their state of undress.
Oh, Saki! Are you okay?
That one looked especially bad!
You're just full of surprises, aren't you, Akko?
Ah, seems poor judgment has made something of a spectacle of both of us.
So it's all eyes on ~target~ then? A big moment for us all, I'd wager.
Come now, let us having something to boo, cheer, and hiss about.
All this power is making me so terribly curious about your body, or at least unashamed of my curiosity.
Just because I find a bit of amusement in your potential humiliation does not mean I bear you any ill will. 'Tis just a mood I am in to~background.time~.
I take no pleasure in your humiliation, but I'd be lying if I said I was not curious.
For what it's worth, I admire your courage, ~target~.
I cannot promise I will fully avert my eyes, but I will endeavor not to stare overmuch.
Honestly, you should not take your ease of this game if you'd like to avoid this predicament.
Modesty is a virtue, ~target~, but unfortunately gambling is a vice.
Seems bad luck has made a spectacle of us both.
I would be immensely grateful for any attention you could direct away from me.
If anyone should make fun of you, ~target~, do not forget I can freeze the hairs off their flesh.
Between the pair of us, oh- perhaps I should not say "pair."
I am compelled to remind you I did not bring this occasion to bear out of some ill will I bear towards you.
All I can think is perhaps everyone will look away from me for two seconds.
We've fallen quite a ways, haven't we ~target~.
If it makes you feel better, ~target~, I will threaten to incinerate anyone who laughs.
Good, she's still unharmed. 'Tis a shame such a cute girl has to explode at all.
Even this part of you is nearly sickeningly adorable.
Oh, ~target~ is just too cute. I fear I may devour them completely while I'm like this.
Well, aren't you quite the treat?
I think you're quite beautiful, ~target~. Any who disagree might get "accidentally" clawed just a tiny bit.
They suit you quite nicely, ~target~.
Beauty is not built in onzes of flesh, ~target~. It blossoms in the mind of an observer.
As practical as they are cute, ~target~.
Very adorable, ~target~. I'm quite envious.
'Twould be easier to shield myself if mine were that size.
Ultimately the only aspect of a woman's chest that draws unwanted attention is that it is indeed a woman's chest.
I hope you bear no misgivings about your bosom, ~target~. Scores of women would kill for what you have.
I may be undressed, but I can still call the lightning down on whomsoever makes untoward comments to ~target~.
You are quite lovely, ~target~. Full marks.
Aside from your nudity, I'd say you've nothing to be ashamed of.
Mayhap it would be self serving to say, but this group is remarkably attractive all around.
You'd think a place like this would be filled with gruff dastards, but then there are cute girls like ~target~ here. 'Tis passing strange...
My word, you could give Ifrit a run for his money.
That's the spirit, Leonie. Should I lose my top, I doubt I'll be so composed.
Aye, I believe you have the right of it, Leonie. 'Tis something for those braver than I.
I'd say such a thing is practically encouraged on this beach, Leonie.
I have been wondering that same thing, Leonie.
I think the question is less if there is a rule against it, but if there would be any soul around here willing to enforce it.
Nobody has raised any objections to me, thus far. Not that I plan on making a habit of this...
Men go topless at the beach all the time, Leonie. Seems wrong to let them have all the fun.
Remember where we are, Leonie. I think all forms of nudity are allowed--- nay, encouraged on this beach.
Oh yes, there are most certainly those who go for this kind of woman. What is it they say? 'Tis more to love?
Oh, is that how it is? They do say imitation is the most sincere form of flattery.
Ah, so lovely. It does so stir the appetite.
Oh yes, the pair of us could cause quite a stir...
Makes me yearn a bit for my natural body, or perhaps this is a different sort of yearning? How curious.
You've such a flattering figure, ~target~, and you didn't even have to absorb an unsafe quantity of aether to get it.
You'd be the envy of all Eorzea, ~target~.
Oh, very well, I am compelled to stare just a tiny bit.
You've a fine figure, ~target~.
The whole of the Inventory no doubt delights at your very presence.
I do believe you are drawing stares from beyond our table...
I'm playing as hard as I can to avoid further embarrassment. I am ashamed it comes at such high cost to you.
If you agreed to play, you must have known this was a possibility; although, the same could be said for me...
I know not what it's worth, but your figure is quite flattering.
Well, that's not a bad look on you.
I'd say you've got a tasteful figure, ~target~.
I bet you're considered quite the catch where you hail from.
I understand you might be embarrassed, so I hope it helps to know we are all thoroughly impressed.
Ah, using arcanum to alter a bosom? I don't mean to laugh, but it's just... well, very ridiculous.
Oh dear, that's not a glamour. I don't think I've ever seen someone use their arcane arts to such a thing.
Well, that was a nice spot of excitement, between the structural failure of your attire and summoning arts I'm not sure the rest of the game can live up to the standard.
I am sorry, Polly. You can fool everyone else with a trick of the light, but the aether of your body is another matter entirely.
I mean, I could estimate the size even with your ~clothing~ on, but seeing them out in the open is quite something.
Is it rude to ask if you are popular with the men in your world?
Oh my, I'd say you have me beat!
Do you have some Roegadyn blood on your mother's side?
Your poor ~clothing~. I believe ~clothing.ifPlural(they have|it has)~ earned a reprieve.
I would be beyond hope to shield my bosom were mine so ample.
This sort of size verges on problematic.
I've seen Roegadyn women with the selfsame bust, but all of them were far taller and robust than you or I.
I knew they would be considerable, but seeing them is still...
I pray that those are not unmanageable for you.
I hope the men of your world do not make themselves too much of a nuisance for you.
Your offerings are so very different from mine...
A woman's bosom radiates a strange gravity that draws in even one's gaze...
~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ been quite the boon, actually. Dare I say it's hardly worth playing without ~player~ around.
My, my. Nary a scrap of an undershirt. For such a cute face, you've a bit of a bolder side, Fina.
For what little 'tis worth, you handled that with more candor than I.
I do believe this is exactly what every guardian fears will come of their ward once out of their care.
If you've a habit of going around without a top, there is naught else I can do but agree with you on that.
I know some women do, but one must be careful not to overexpose themselves in the strong sunlight. 'Tis easier to burn than tan for some, and there are some places no one wants a sunburn.

state.text: Not something I've ever done before. I suppose we shall see how it goes.

case.state: Oh, so then they're both...
I see our familiar friend is returned to us...
Stay strong, Shimakaze!
Quite the performance, Akko. You get full marks for that.
I must be in a mood if this is getting me all excited.
I promise there will be only minimal teasing. 'Tis only fair considering you did lose.
Well? We're all waiting in hungry anticipation.
We're well beyond the point of being shy.
The excitement is palpable here, ~target~.
If you must bare your womanhood, do so secure in the knowledge that each one is a little odd looking.
I think the thing we'll admire most is your aplomb.
Take your time if you need to, ~target~.
If you're willing to go this far to win, then you have my respect.
The price of loss in this game only becomes more steep.
If it comforts you at all, I can avert my gaze while your undress.
Such an asinine game...
I know it seems unfair to you, ~target~, but I could tolerate a little solidarity.
By the game's design, this table grows increasingly indecent.
Everyone here has seen mine, so I'm sure showing yours will be less of an upset.
That's an embarrassment I know all too well by now.
By the Twelve... it's just like Amaurot...
Skinny dipping, Leonie. 'Tis almost as juvenile as, well, playing strip poker.
Skinny dipping? Oh no, not in the ocean. No guarantee there aren't jellyfish out there.
Your abuse of ordinance would offend the machinists of Ishgard just as much as your perversion would offend her priests. Not a proud accomplishment.
Please tell me the end of her clothes means the end of the explosions? I just can't imagine what will happen now that she's exposed like this...
Huh... intriguing...
Planning on seeing this all the way through? I'm quite curious to see more from you...
And pray tell, what will you be showing us next?
Quaint, but I think another loss would suite you much better.
'Tis probably my drastic imbalance in aether speaking, but you are quite lovely to behold like this.
Yes, well, there it is. What more can one say?
Now, now, let's refrain from any vulgarities. ~Target~ is still a person with feelings.
Take care what you do with your hands, ~target~. Who knows what sort of blights cover this place...
By the Twelve, this game is quite asinine...
I shall see this through, even if it should make me a hypocrite.
Eyes forward, Shtola. The game is not over yet.
As long as you're still in this game, ~target~, I'm afraid I must continue to push you lower.
I can only proffer another apology as I prepare again to take you down.
We make a shameful pair, ~target~.
You'll see this through, ~target~, with your head up higher than mine.
Better play to win, ~target~. That's my advice for you.
By the Twelve, is this not why this game is ever played? How asinine...
What shall it be, ~player~? Care to show us how you muster your courage?
Shall you continue to hide, ~player~? I had wondered if you possessed a bit more gall than this.
Oh, just ~player~ this time? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ does not have the greatest track record for injecting excitement into the proceedings.
Ah, ~player~, I can already tell you know what I'm going to say. Mayhap 'tis hypocritical of me, but if you cared enough to prove me wrong...
What's with that look, ~player~? Seems to me neither of us are getting out unscathed. Are you going to continue staving off embarrassment or will you deign to embrace it?
I can sympathize with the corner you find yourself backed into, ~player~. I believe it leaves us both wondering if it would have been better to simply get it over with...
Kaz Kaan: the man famous for being single, unless I am misunderstanding your claim to fame.
I do hope these losses won't dampen your spirits, Kaz.
I'm curious about your ability to employ magic, Kaz. You've surprisingly dense aether, which has quite intriguing implications as to your capabilities.
At this rate, Kaz, you're going to end up a naked gentleman besides an elegant one.
Now we'll really see if Kaz can keep his cool under pressure, or at least muster some up now that it's his turn.
Now, let's see what all the fuss is about. What's put Kaz Kaan above all other men among his people?
You've the unmistakable garb of a scholar, Heris. Pray tell, did you come here in aid of your studies?
'Tis my understanding you're a historian, Robin, and an archaeologist to boot. As something of a student of history myself, I'd be greatly interested in hearing of your studies.
'Tis passing strange to think that though we are both students of history, our findings are likely wildly different thanks to our hailing. Still, I think 'twould be interesting to share notes.
So, you are an actress, yes? I know little of the theater, but it does seem like a rather exciting life.
This one is not exactly human, but she seems harmless enough...
Despite appearances, Cagliostro's aether bares the distinct signatures of someone quite long-lived. Unaturally long-lived.
Not a Miqo'te... she's something else entirely. Something... not so mundane.
Curious. For a purported goddess, Noire seems somewhat mundane overall.
I do like those boots. Can't say I own anything quite like them.
Seems like you and ~player~ have some sort of history, Noire. You are friends, I take it?
So are games like this normal fare for the deities of your world then?
Hm... a bit slight for a Hrothgar. Perhaps he is some manner of beastman?
By your attire, I would take you for a student. I do not mean to sound surprised, but you don't strike me as, and I mean no offense, a scholar.
Obviously the pair of us are quite different, Mari. Forgive me if it seems like I harbor any animosity towards you. 'Tis only that I struggle to imagine myself in your shoes.
A katana? Hm, seems unlikely he's a Doman samurai. The clothes suggest he's simply an adventurer...

Forgive me for prying, but 'tis plain you are favoring your right arm. If you are injured in some way, Dunban, you need not suffer in silence. Come, show me the wound and I'll see if my magicks cannot set you right.
You seem to have fumbled, ~player~. Mayhap you've allowed your thoughts to stray? Best clean out the gutters before it's too late.
~Player~, that is not a strong showing on your part. 'Twas impressed upon me that you might know your way around this game.
If you're so intent on losing, ~player~, mayhap we should leave the mopping up to you.
You might be making this a tad too easy, ~player~. If it's out of some nobler sentiment, I'm afraid it only comes off as foolhardy.
Admirable as it is to play the hand you are dealt, mayhap an earnest effort to improve it might suit you better next time.
Not one much for conversation or strategy, it would seem. You're a bit of a curiosity, ~player~.
You show a concerning lack of aptitude for this, ~player~. You could at least blame your fortune..
Come now, ~player~. I can hardly save you from the embarrassment of losing, but you should at least put up a good front before you do.
So, a Miqo'te with no tail? Well, mayhap you are not a miqo'te at all. I know from experience that the terminology can vary from place to place.
'Tis a bit comforting to have another Miqo'te here. Though, I am unsure if you'd call yourself that. If there is a name for your people that you prefer, do let me know.
Less the card shark and more the card minnow, perhaps?
'Tis a shame you had to lose, but I wonder if you're fool enough to try again.
If that's your idea of a good play, I'm afraid you'll not last long here, ~player~.
Apologies. I know you don't like losing any more than I do, ~target~.
Seems 'tis your turn to show your pluck, ~target~. If you've any to spare, I could certainly use some should I lose again.
We've both had a bout of poor fortune, haven't we, ~target~? Apologies that I have contributed to yours.
I hope there are no hard feelings, ~target~. Feel free to chide me should I blunder, if it pleases you...
Seems you've no shortage of aether, ~target~. Shame that any talent you might have for spellcraft hasn't availed you here.
An unfortunate turn, ~target~. Try and remember 'tis merely a game, just in good fun.
Losing is never pleasant, ~target~. I know not what if aught can boost your confidence, but whatever may come to pass I'll not think less of you.
Apologies, ~target~. I can assure you we all admire you and your courage thus far.
I know being told not to worry does little good, so instead I'll say that in your position ~target~ I'd very much be a wreck.
Since you'll be undressing, ~target~, I hope you have some other way to protect against the sun. It's no good to be overexposed when it is beating down so.
You're certainly dressed for the weather, ~target~. Mayhap you're taking a vacation too?
I see you weren't worried about others possibly seeing your cards reflected in your sunglasses either, ~target~.
I daresay, ~target~, I think you'd fit in with the other Scions and I. Quite a few of my compatriots have white hair as well, myself included obviously.
After what we endured in the First, I'd be surprised if there was a light pun I'd not yet heard.
Three in a row, ~target~? It's not a good look.
Need a refresher on the rules, ~target~?
Two losses would seem bad luck, but three is a pattern, ~target~.
Unless this is some sort of elaborate ruse, at least we know ~target~ is not cheating...
Oh dear, ~target~. You're having a run of it, I'd wager.
I would chalk that up to bad luck, ~target~.
The odds continue to be against you.
Another loss, ~target~. Perhaps you should reevaluate your strategy.
You're not getting psyched out, are you, ~target~?
What do you think, ~target~? Is the challenge too much for you?
Mayhap ~target~ just wants to lose?
What are the odds? Does someone have it out for ~target~?
Really? Again? You must needs try harder.
~Target~, this is becoming troublesome...
No surprise there, I suppose.
You do realize what happens when you lose, right?
Someone here isn't cheating to sabotage ~target~, right?
You can't actually just be this bad at the game, right ~target~?
The first few times were funny, but the joke's wearing thin...
Is there some reason why this is happening?
I don't intend to let up, ~target~. I shall be victorious.
I'm determined to win now, ~target~. It's nothing personal.
There is an element of strategy and forethought needed for this game, ~target~. That is how I plan to win.
One loss was not going to be sufficient, ~target~. Not if I'm going to win.
'Tis all part of the plan that you should continue to lose so that I may win.
Have I not made my intentions to win clear? You'll not beat me, ~target~.
I'm resolved to stay, but I'd advise you, ~target~, that now may be the time to walk away.
I'm playing to win, ~target~. I believe I warned you.
I said I would win, ~target~. I am merely seeing that through.

Urianger is a fellow Scion, one of my esteemed colleagues. He's wise beyond his years and incredibly well read, but he has a penchant for being theatrical that some find a bit hard to follow, even in idle conversation.

Thancred is a fellow Scion. He's quite rough around the edges, but his talent for espionage is invaluable to our operations. He performs his duties quite diligently, especially if there are ladies about.

Alphinaud and Alisae are actually the twin grandchildren of an old ally. Despite their youth, they are immensely talented in both magic and politics. Of course, they scarce hold a candle to me at their age...

Krile has been a longtime ally of the Scions. She's a scholar among scholars, one of the most brilliant arcanists of our time. Even in areas I had struggled, she'd been able to furnish us with a solution.

I hail from a world we call The Source. The First is an offshoot, an entire world separate yet inextricably linked to our own. Travel between the two is nigh impossible, but I was still conveyed there in a rather fantastic accident.

Lyse is a fellow Scion and a dear friend. She's a talented pugilist, and 'tis comforting to finally see her come into her place in the world. Though the storm of conflict took much from her, she stood firm at the helm.

Tataru is the secretary for the Scions. She keeps our books, procures our supplies, and generally frets over our health. We're always a bit light on funds, so she's tried her hand at many a trade to try and earn some extra coin for us.
Aether is, in simplest terms, elemental energy. It is employed in magecraft to perform magicks, but 'tis also flowing and affecting all around it passively. When out of balance, disaster oft follows.

The Echo is... well, difficult to explain to a lay person. 'Tis considered a blessing, making one more sensitive to the thoughts and feelings of those around them. 'Tis not solely clairvoyance, but 'tis often the impression it gives.
Good, this shall chip away at ~target~'s defenses.
~Target~, you could afford that loss. You'll have another if I can help it.
Aye, serves ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ right.
Ah-haha! Victory is mine! You'll take the fall in my place, ~target~!
There. That is how Y'shtola Rhul disposes of rubbish.
Apologies, ~target~. Try not to let this discourage you. There is plenty of time for your luck to turn around.
Someone must be the first to lose, and 'tis a shame it had to be you, ~target~.
Don't think this a bad omen, ~target~. Luck is as often fickle with her curses as her blessings.
Why ask me, Kaz? Does it look like I could possibly know?
